content: **pattern description from marniemaclean com ** a friend of mine has a lovely little girl named paige when i was asked to make her a poncho preferably featuring pink i knew i wanted to do something that looked like a spring garden looking through my various crochet books i couldn t find a motif that was quite right combining elements of a few different motifs i came up with this design if you would like to make this poncho just about any worsted weight yarn will do i suggest cotton for its long wear and wash ability if you wish to use a wool blend make sure that the recipient doesn t have any sensitivities to wool **supplies ** * 3 skeins of bernat cotton ultra soft in purple and pink * 4 skeins of bernat cotton ultra soft in green * size g crochet hook * size 7 knitting needles * tapestry needle
